com.soa.message

Class AbstractExchange

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.soa.message.AbstractExchange
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Exchange
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    SimpleExchange, SOAPExchange

    public abstract class AbstractExchange
extends java.lang.Object
implements Exchange
    Abstract implementation of the Exchange interface that can be easily extended for specific implementations.
    Since:
    5.0

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from interface com.soa.message.Exchange

      • getPropertyNames

        public java.util.Set getPropertyNames()
        Description copied from interface: Exchange
        Returns the names of the properties associated with the context. Changes made to the Set are reflected in the context, so if a name is removed from the Set, the property is removed from the context. Names cannot be added however.
        Specified by:
        getPropertyNames in interface Exchange
        Returns:
        Set of String property names.

      • getAuditLogger

        public com.soa.log.ContextLogger getAuditLogger()
        Description copied from interface: Exchange
        Provides audit logging capabilities. This is different than the system logging capabilities provided by ContextLogger. The audit log statements are governed by and viewed in the management application. Each log statement has a different level of importance or purpose, debug, warning, or error in that order. These statements will only be seen in the log if the handler is invoked with a level equal to or greater than that statement.
        Specified by:
        getAuditLogger in interface Exchange
        Returns:
        Logger.

      • setAuditLogger

        public void setAuditLogger(com.soa.log.ContextLogger logger)
        Description copied from interface: Exchange
        Associates an audit logger with the exchange.
        Specified by:
        setAuditLogger in interface Exchange
        Parameters:
        logger - Logger.
